post.body: wow ur fast. am n this conf too, will come say hi after
welcome to tweetland! :)
what's your email?
Neat new website!
oops. I probably shouldnt have tweeted that publicly.
I think he kinda ended up comparing microsoft to toilet paper,coz nobody put thr hand up whn he asked who tht Microsoft is cool.
Hmmm there are lots of donkeys but here they are called camels. :)
ha :)
Ah I thought I'd catch you at lunch! Bueno, I'll shoot you an email. Happy Monday.
what's wrong with a Gmail address!? The number after is a big nono though
great ppt!
yeah I should've just come. I'm down with a cold today. I wanna come to these saturday things. Will be in touch for next week.HNY!
Hey the WordPress meet sounds like fun, I will pass by! Do let us know if it gets cancelled..!
hi from Dubai!
Welcome to the Twitterati :)
I totally will! I'm living at my parents house in Deira at the moment, but will be moving out. Work in Oud Metha.Talksoon!
just saw the Twitpic from your brother's pad in Dubai. Whoa, where is that? Is it the Marina?
I'm bored of it. @tomsp will check out Wizz!
Introduced to Muxlim.com. Very interesting. I wonder why it's based in Finland.
Meeting lots of great new media savvy people at this Dubai media event. I never thought I'd be such a geek :)
Listening to MBC guy at the Dubai New Media event. Shame he doesn't have a presentation. 5 Atleast he is interactive.
ah there`s another tweeter at the new media conf in dubai. that's cool.
i wonder if anyones live twittering/ blogging this.
“Twitter me“ "see u on twitter" is all i hear. but ofcourse. doh.
badges!
Im at a new media conference. waiting for it to start. excited but i dont have business cards yet! oh well, i will have to wear the
My office is a fridge. Brrrr.
Website of "Latinos in Dubai" blocked. What rubbish. http://www.oyeme.com/group/latinosendubai
I need someone to push me to change to go dancing.
I've only worked a week, and I'm exhausted!
How ugly is the BlackBerry Bold 9000. I'm not sure I want to be reachable online and on phone, all day every day.
I want to walk to something in Dubai that is not a mall!
Just watched "A Wednesday". What. A. Film.
I need to learn to set boundaries.
I'm sick of guys being jerks to me. Where are all the normal guys!?
Just got to Dubai after a week in Mumbai. At work already. Pinch me someone!
Some girl called Fatima wants to be my friend on Facebook, and her profile pictures is ME! Scary stuff.
I'm so not a morning person.
Bought a RED Honda Accord Coupe. It's like the cheapest cool car.
Ready for work an hour before I should be. Why?!
Done with the Dubai New Media Conf. Mixed feelings bout its success. Btw a few ppts and networking,was def worth it.
"Brands can't buy cool. If u sell toilet paper you're never going to be cool" - Philippe Deltenre, media strategist,Microsoft :)
Khimji guy did good demo of their blogging experiment in Oman. Chk out khimjiblog.com to see what they've done.
Listening to Rajiv Ahuja of Khimchi Ramdas, apparently the only company in Oman that is Corporate Blogging.
Great ppt by Robin Hamman of HeadShift. He used to head blogging at the BBC, so as a fellow blogger he was very insightful.
Co. Real Opinions talking on the impact of the internet on the ME. Pl. Give us some numbers!
At the Dubai New Media event day 2. Supposed to start at 830. Ofcourse it can't coz only 8 of us are here on time.
Am at Cinnabon in Ghurair Centre reading the World in 2009 according to The Economist. How great is this magazine!
Going to bed after watching Dostana. Wasn't as bad as I thought it wud be.Goodnite and Happy New Year fellow Tweeters.
Waiting for mutton biryani to arrive from Gazebo. I have heard too much about it...apparently it's the best in town! Will give feedback.
Seriously thick fog in Dubai this morning. As the morning fades it will become smog.
The Twitterati sorted by industry. Pretty cool. http://tinyurl.com/66rpeo
Simple Social Media Truths. So true! http://tinyurl.com/452ls3
Dancing makes me so happy. Sigh.
Richard Branson's new book:Business Stripped Bare. http://www.rhgdigital.co.uk/ebooks/
Went back to Aviation Club today for Body Pump, after almost 3 years.Everything and everyone was the same. Time can stand still, eh.
Great social media website http://www.socialmediatoday.com/
Companies and Social Media http://tinyurl.com/79v6xb
Musical fish for the blind. How awesome. http://tinyurl.com/96qm2v
Can anyone recommend me a better news reader than Google Reader and Netvibes?
